content: HLC-T Sleeve anchor Economical sleeve anchor (tie wire head) ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Pre-assembled anchor for easy and fast installation Imprint in the sleeve that shows the drill bit required Bulged middle section of sleeve with triangular diamond shaped openings help prevent the anchor from twisting in its hole or dropping out of an overhead hole Applications Attaching wire tie in a variety of base materials ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Tie wire Environmental conditions: Indoor, dry conditions Approvals / Test reports: N/A Technical Data | Head configuration | Tie wire | Environmental conditions | Indoor, dry conditions | Approvals / Test reports | N/A | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated ### ITEMS- 336241 - Sleeve anchor HLC-T 1/4 x 1-3/8 - Package Size 50 pc Package Contents: - 1x HLC-T 1/4X1 3/8 Sleeve anchor assy - 338087 - Sleeve anchor HLC-T 1/4 x 1-3/8 MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 600x HLC-T 1/4X1 3/8 Sleeve anchor assy
